name: Puzzle Hexa: Princess and Zombies
description:
A highly addictive puzzle game to wake up sleeping brains!

Puzzle Hexa : Princess and Zombies is an immersive game that can be enjoyed by children and adults! Feel the electrifying excitement of clearing all the stages of Puzzle Hexa : Princess and Zombies! A great casual game for killing time!

▶ Puzzle Hexa : Princess and Zombies Official Fan Page : https://www.facebook.com/superbox01

- This game supports '한국어', 'Indonesian', 'Bahasa malay', 'English', '日本語', '中文简体', '中文繁體', 'Deutsch', 'français', 'Español', 'ไทย', 'Русский', 'Arabic', 'Portuguese', 'Turkish', 'Italian'.

【Puzzle Hexa : Princess and Zombies Features】
◈ An addictive game enjoyed by people all around the world!
◈ Over 700 special stage modes!
◈ Combo achievements with horizontal and diagonal line removal makes for exciting games!
◈ A small 18MB game that can be downloaded by any device!
◈ Play anytime and anywhere without Wi-Fi!

【How to play Puzzle Hexa : Princess and Zombies】
◈ Arrange the blocks of the same color into a straight line to destroy them.
◈ Fill the given blocks into a single large block.

- This game is acceptable for purchasing the items partially. When purchasing the items, the additional costs could be occurred and limited Consumer Right of Defense according to the item types.

▶ Let's Enjoy SUPERBOX ◀
